channel.title: Unable to load character files
channel.description: Hello I am using a source called Boratscape, and when I runserver everything is fine, until I get to the point where I try to log in. It says unable to load character files. It is very frustrating and the only thing I know what to do is make a character file and name it which i tried and it doesn't work. PLease help me.. it still doesnt work..

item.description:

It was made by lmctruck30 and was the best source from July 2007 - June 2008 as of what lmc said…

any ideas it says character file not found
moreinfo file not found
error writing file

item.title: Unable to load character files
item.dc:creator: @pking_nubs3 pking nubs3
item.description:
@pking_nubs3 wrote:

If you don’t have a character file in your source,
Right click in the file source and click Create new or
Something like that and it will ask you what new thing you
Would like to make. Choose New Folder and then rename it
Characters.

Read full topic
